00027 /*
00028  *  The following vectorclasses are available here:
00029  *
00030  *  Name         | Contains elements
00031  *  -------------+------------------
00032  *  Vector       | uint32
00033  *  IntVector    | int32
00034  *  Vector16     | uint16
00035  *  ObjVector    | VectorElement*
00036  *  StringVector | char*
00037  *  VoidVector   | void*
00038  *
00039  *  Questions to
00040  *
00041  *
00042  *  Some strange looking defines are found below.
00043  *  The real source code is in the file VectorTemplates.cc
00044  *
00045  */
00046 
00047 /*
00048   todo
00049 
00050   VectorElement can be typechecked using templates,
00051   and casting can be avoided.
00052   
00053 */
00054 
00055 // "global defines", complicated
00056 #define Default_ElementTypeSearchComp(a,b) \
00057 Deref(a) < Deref(m_buf[b]) ? \
00058 -1 : (Deref(a) > Deref(m_buf[b]) ? 1 : 0)
00059 #define Default_ElementTypeComp(a,b) \
00060 Default_ElementTypeSearchComp(m_buf[a], (b))
00061 #define Default_ElementTypeLinearSearchComp(a, b) \
00062 Deref(a) != Deref(b) ? true : false
00063 
00064 // the name of the class
00065 #define TemplateVector Vector
00066 // the invalid element
00067 #define InvalidElement MAX_UINT32
00068 // the type of the elements
00069 #define ElementType    uint32
00070 // a debug string for printing
00071 #define debugString    "uint32"
00072 // ...
00073 #define UINT32
00074 // the elementtype can be passed to ostr to print, no conversion
00075 #define DEFAULT_PRINT
00076 // the dereference operator, if any
00077 #define Deref
00078 // the method of comparison
00079 //#define ElementTypeSEARCH_COMP(a, b) ((int64)((int64)a-(int64)buf[b]))
00080 #define ElementTypeSEARCH_COMP(a, b) (a < m_buf[b] ? -1 : a > m_buf[b] ? 1 : 0)
00081 //)((int64)((int64)a-(int64)buf[b]))
00082 #define ElementTypeCOMP(a, b) (ElementTypeSEARCH_COMP(m_buf[a], (b)))
00083 #define ElementTypeLINEAR_SEARCH_COMP(a, b) Default_ElementTypeLinearSearchComp(a, m_buf[b])
00084 #include "VectorTemplates.cc"
00085 //typedef UINT32VectorClass Vector;
00086 //#define Vector UINT32VectorClass
00087 #undef  TemplateVector
00088 #undef  InvalidElement
00089 #undef  ElementType
00090 #undef  debugString
00091 #undef  UINT32
00092 #undef  DEFAULT_PRINT
00093 #undef  Deref
00094 #undef  ElementTypeSEARCH_COMP
00095 #undef  ElementTypeCOMP
00096 #undef  ElementTypeLINEAR_SEARCH_COMP
00097
